  • Dream of Writing a blog

    17 Oct 2018

    Yes, Making a blog and posting constantly is also one of the items in my bucket list for a long time. Actually, I have tried to accomplish this dream many years ago. I wrote about some random tech hacks, one or two cricket stories and by strong procrastination, I stopped...
